page.title: 19Tamerton Foliot Naval Estate
page.content:
The Naval Estate was built in roughly 1963. It was built to house mainly families of the navy and the marines. There are about 400 houses on the Estate.There is a shop called the N.A.A.F.I where you can buy all kinds of things. People don't live there for many years because they get transferred or they leave and find themselves a council house.The longest you can live on the Estate is 11 years then you can sign on for another 5 years and in that time you have to find another house. In our class children from the estate have lived in Portsmouth,Hong Kong,Rosyth,Gibraltar and Singapore.
Paul French and Paul Goodwin.
